report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Information]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Description of Damage:**
The image provided shows a vehicle with a noticeable crack running along the side panel. The crack appears to be a long, linear scratch that extends from one end of the visible portion of the vehicle's body to the other.

**Location of Damage:**
The crack is located on the side panel of the vehicle, approximately in the middle section. It runs horizontally across the body, starting near the front fender and extending towards the rear.

**Type of Damage:**
This appears to be a scratch or dent caused by an impact or collision. The linear nature suggests it could have been caused by a sharp object or a forceful contact with another surface.

**Conclusion:**
There is visible damage to the vehicle as described above. The crack will need to be assessed further to determine the extent of the damage and whether it affects the structural integrity of the vehicle. Additional inspection may be required to confirm the full extent of the damage.

**Recommendation:**
It is recommended that the vehicle undergo a thorough inspection by a qualified mechanic or repair professional to assess the damage fully and provide an accurate estimate for repairs.

**Prepared By:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Date:**
[Insert Date]
